body:
Especially since this *does* work (`grad` is not `None` at the end), where the only difference is whether `inc` is external to the while loop or not:

```python
with g.as_default():
    i=tf.constant(1, name="i")
    inc=tf.constant(1, name="inc")
    w=tf.while_loop(lambda i: i<=5, lambda i: [i+inc], [i])
    grad=tf.gradients(w, i)
```
